content: What you'll earn on deposits over a year. This includes compounding.
How much your assets count for collateral, relative to their USD value. The higher the weight, the more collateral you can borrow against it.
Total blonkfi deposits for each asset. Everything is denominated in native token.
Each blonkfi pool has global deposit and borrow limits, also known as caps. This is the total amount that all users combined can deposit or borrow a given token.
What percentage of supplied tokens have been borrowed. This helps determine interest rates. This is not based on the global pool limits, which can limit utilization.
